name: @soffinal/stream
description: A reactive event streaming library for TypeScript/JavaScript

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --sourcemap --minify && bun run build:types
scripts.release: git add . && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git tag v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')

author: Soffinal <smari.sofiane@gmail.com>
